name: The Place I Called Home
description:
A First person adventure / walking simulator set behind picturesque mountains and woodland areas surrounded by wildlife. In this gripping story you play as Sophia Carter, who brings you back to her childhood to try and move on from her past, as well as collecting items along the way you will soon learn the dark truth that is haunting Sophia...


Key features:


* A beautiful detailed environment that truly rewards players who explore with story insights and depth to the main story line.

* A 30-60 minute experience, that can be completed in one sitting.

* Discover and Interact with wildlife roaming around the world.

* Collect items and read Diary Pages.

* Find food to keep Sophia's strength up.
